title.rendered: Exposure Visit at Pressto Dry Cleaners and Laundry

content.rendered:
On 20th September, 2015 students from STeP Center Society for Human & Environmental Development, Mumbai went to Pressto Dry Cleaners and Laundry in Andheri west.

Total of 25 students were present for the visit. Mr. Mohamed, Store Manager, Pressto Dry Cleaners and Laundry, interacted with the students and shared the skill of managing customer. Mr. Mohamed explained to the whole dry cleaning process and laundry process. He also gave some important facts of retail management. While visiting the Laundry section, they observed that the process of packaging was divided into two sections. First normal packaging and second bag packaging. After observation, students asked their question which were answered by the store manager.

At the end of the day the students were able to relate what they were taught in the class regarding the retail sector and students asked various question regarding job opportunities. The students were happy and learned many new things through this visit and look forward to get an employment in this sector.
